sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>When spending a maneuver to direct a bonded animal, the character may suffer 1 strain to add a boost die to the animal's next check.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Animal Bond (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001299</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-06-25 21:01:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>53664e102f89b810e0f497eef699b6e5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-25 21:01:14</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
